ygData.subject: Re: Electrum Bladed Wakizashi Quest?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You read my mind. I was gonna ask that myself. I know the sword is 1HS, 7/21, and weighs 2. However, I too would like to know the quest and requirements
ygData.messageBody:
> Hello fellow Dark Elfs, I'm new to the Shadowknight onelist. Glad to be
> aboard. I noticed Chris Rosset said something about the Electrum Bladed
> Qakizashi Quest. I've never heard of this quest nor this sword. Could
> someone give a brief description of where i can get the quest... i would
> like to try it.

You read my mind. I was gonna ask that myself. I know the sword is 1HS,
7/21, and weighs 2.

However, I too would like to know the quest and requirements behind it. It'd
give something to do besides powerleveling (I'm 23 now btw, Beld ;).

Dravith Vandre'i
